attributes.action: Legislate to stop bad behaviour in the classroom by getting tough with the parents/guardians
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Bad behaviour in the classroom affects the learning of children and impacts on society and is not fair on anyone.  Vast sums of money are waisted trying to solve the problem and it seems we blame everyone but the children and their parents/guardians.  I feel the government should get tough with the parents/guardians of these children and make them take responsibility for their actions, on the spot fines given by the schools or stopping/reducing benefits are possible solutions.
